column1: This moisturizer is one of the best kept secret in beauty. It was refered to me by a family friend and I have used it every day ever since!

DML is one of the best facial moisturizers I've used with good SPF. I received a sample about a decade ago and have tried other moisturizers off and on and returned to DML. The value pack is a good deal as it's hard to find for me locally.
